Reviews.Title: A great laptop
Reviews.Author: S. S. Richards "S, Steve Richards"
Reviews.Content: This model Toshiba Laptop is fast and useful for all my needs. I was sorry to leave my familiar old XP desktop, but learning windows 8 isn't the chore i thought it would be. It Comes with Intel Core i7 Processor 8 GB DIMM RAM and 1 TB . Hard Drive. It also comes with a back lighted keyboard, DVD/CD drive and 3 USB slots and a Hdmi slot.  I feel I have the flexibility to do all I need. I'm sure I have a good investment .

Reviews.Title: Fast processor, uncomfortable framing to rest your hands
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: I enjoy the robust speed and quiet sound of the laptop. The speakers are ok, not great, not bad either. The keyboard is smooth and perfectly placed numeric keys, unlike Samsung laptops. However, the plastic framing is rough and kinda annoying. ITs sharp on the ends and you cannot rest your hands very long. Other than that, not bad at all.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Satellite S55-A5154 15.6-Inch Laptop
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Quevedo
Reviews.Content: It's a beautiful machine, just like in the pictures. The delivery service is the best, I'm very happy with my new lap top.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Justin Bressette
Reviews.Content: This is a great lap top, windows 8 takes some time to get used to. But this product has exceeded my expectation.

Reviews.Title: Works great so far
Reviews.Author: Gunnar B. Podolec "Podolec"
Reviews.Content: I have only had it about a week and everything is running great. Fast boot time, good screen, reasonable benchmarks (Note this is performance not graphics. Because its integrated graphics it’s almost pointless to benchmark them). The things I dislike are the DVD rom and the plastic chassis are way cheap.

Reviews.Title: Very nice product
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Craig H."
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing laptop, it is sleek and has the processing power and ram needed to run software. The keyboard lights up and it looks very nice, not cheesy at all. It's not a touch screen but that is not a big deal. It does have some weight to it, it is not light like a tablet but not big and bulky either.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: JCgt
Reviews.Content: excellent laptop. Due to the processor, the speed is very good. responds very well.The only downside: few USB ports, but it's a detail.points:Design: 10/10Speed: 9/10Size: CompactAudio: very acceptable 8/10

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i7-4700MQ 2.4 GHz Processor
8 GB DIMM RAM
1 TB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
15.6-Inch Screen, Mobile Intel HD graphics
Windows 8.1, 3.91-hour battery life
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba Satellite S55-A5154 15.6-Inch Laptop
